recipes.title: Marrow chutney
recipes.description: What will you do with your courgette glut? Make the most of them in a fruity chutney with ginger, apples, sultanas and shallots

recipes.title: Blackberry pie
recipes.description: Master the art of making a blackberry pie with our ultimate recipe – we’ve got a few tricks up our sleeve to right some common wrongs

recipes.title: Aubergine parmigiana lasagne
recipes.description: Combine two Italian classics - parmigiana and lasagne - in this veggie bake. It's ideal for batch cooking as you can freeze it before or after baking

recipes.title: Jammy blackberry & almond crumble cake
recipes.description: Enjoy these blackberry and almond cake slices for afternoon tea, or as dessert served with vanilla ice cream. They're made with fresh blackberries and jam

recipes.title: Butternut ricotta tart with fiery rocket salad
recipes.description: A sheet of ready-rolled puff pastry makes for a simple speedy supper- we top ours with cream cheese, sage, nutmeg and squash

recipes.title: Fudgy fig roll
recipes.description: The flavours of the traditional biscuit are turned into a Swiss roll, with added nutmeg, cinnamon, banana in the sponge and a touch of fig jam

recipes.title: Plum gin
recipes.description: Make a batch of plum gin using a glut of fruit from the garden – it can be enjoyed on its own, in a G&T or mixed with lemon juice and sugar syrup for a plum gin sour

recipes.title: Orchard crumble
recipes.description: Got a glut? Use this season’s bounty to bake this gorgeous pud – we chose plums, figs, apples and blackberries

recipes.title: Beetroot & feta pasta
recipes.description: Bring colour to your dinner table with our creamy beetroot and feta pasta. Packed with nutrients, it's a satisfying veggie lunch or supper for the family

recipes.title: Plum & almond pastry
recipes.description: This open fruit tart looks and tastes fantastic for very little effort – frangipane flavours complement sugar plums

recipes.title: Shaved fennel & rocket salad
recipes.description: Serve our fennel and rocket salad as a side – raw fennel can be fibrous, but finely slicing it before lightly pickling it in lemon juice breaks it down

recipes.title: Lemon cheesecake with baked plums & blackberries
recipes.description: This baked cheesecake with citrus cream cheese topping is decorated with late summer fruit

recipes.title: Creamy pumpkin & lentil soup
recipes.description: Whether you're carving a Halloween pumpkin or have picked up a squash from the supermarket, use the plentiful flesh and seeds in this soup

recipes.title: Courgette curry
recipes.description: Scoop out the seeds before slicing and frying the courgettes to achieve a firmer texture in this curry. Nothing is wasted – the seeds bulk out the sauce

recipes.title: Tomato & basil soup
recipes.description: Combine fruity sundried tomatoes with tinned tomatoes to make this rich tomato soup with a homemade basil pesto – perfect for the depths of winter.

recipes.title: Layered aubergine & lentil bake
recipes.description: Puy lentils bulk out this low-calorie vegetarian bake with mozzarella cheese, tomato and basil sauce and roasted aubergines

recipes.title: Plum cake
recipes.description: Serve this hearty fruit sponge with a dollop of something creamy- it would also work with raspberries instead of plums

recipes.title: Late-summer tomato & carrot salad
recipes.description: This vibrant vegetarian side dish is dressed with chilli, spring onion and balsamic vinegar, then sprinkled with crunchy pumpkin seeds

recipes.title: Aubergine, halloumi & harissa skillet bake
recipes.description: Make this special vegetarian aubergine, halloumi, tomato and harissa skillet bake for a midweek meal for two. It's an easy one-pan dinner to share

recipes.title: Caramel apple cinnamon buns
recipes.description: Balance the sharp flavour of apple with the sweetness of caramel and a tangy soft cheese icing to make these toffee-apple-inspired cinnamon buns

recipes.title: Marrow curry
recipes.description: A delicious vegetarian marrow side dish to spice up a main course- it works well with roast lamb or chicken

recipes.title: Roast grouse with blackcurrant & beetroot sauce
recipes.description: Available from August, this game bird is best served with a fresh, full-flavoured fruit sauce and a dash of whisky to boot

recipes.title: Homemade tomato chutney
recipes.description: This homemade chutney is simple to make and is particularly good served with a hard cheese

recipes.title: Blackberry & apple mallow traybake
recipes.description: Dainty sponge bites packed with fruit and topped with crunchy almonds and a light meringue whirl
